name: Unknown Planet (Brain Jar)
description:
Fight your way down into the mysterious planet and save as many of the survivors as you can.  Do you have what it takes to make it out alive?

Ask the Doc for help and see the pilot to upgrade your equipment.

KEYBOARD CONTROLS

Move - Arrow Keys/WASD
Fire - Left Click/Z
Jump  - Spacebar

XBOX CONTROLLER CONTROLS
Move - Left Stick/D-pad
Fire - X
Jump  - A

Credits

This game was made for the 2018 Degica game jam using Godot Engine v2.1.5.

Josh Petty (@brainjarlabs)- Developer
Justin Scott Harriger - Music
Carl Olsson aka Surt - Tile Art
